ControlBlock.Description: Generation of white noise with amplitude (A)

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

MaskParameter.Name: D
MaskParameter.Description: Generate a new value every D samples (1, 2, 3,...)

ImplementationParameter.Name: noise_amplitude
ImplementationParameter.Description: maximum amplitude of the noise signal

ImplementationParameter.Name: noise_amplitude_half
ImplementationParameter.Description: half of the maximum amplitude of the noise signal

ImplementationParameter.Name: sample_time_divisor
ImplementationParameter.Description: every sample_time_divisor sample cycles, a new random number is being generated.

ImplementationParameter.Name: sample_counter
ImplementationParameter.Description: counter for the sample_time_divisor

ImplementationParameter.Name: random_num
ImplementationParameter.Description: variable for the new random number

ImplementationParameter.Name: noise_amplitude
ImplementationParameter.Description: maximum amplitude of the noise signal

ImplementationParameter.Name: noise_amplitude_half
ImplementationParameter.Description: half of the maximum amplitude of the noise signal

ImplementationParameter.Name: sample_time_divisor
ImplementationParameter.Description: every sample_time_divisor sample cycles, a new random number is being generated.

ImplementationParameter.Name: sample_counter
ImplementationParameter.Description: counter for the sample_time_divisor

ImplementationParameter.Name: random_num
ImplementationParameter.Description: variable for the new random number

ImplementationParameter.Name: noise_amplitude
ImplementationParameter.Description: maximum amplitude of the noise signal

ImplementationParameter.Name: noise_amplitude_half
ImplementationParameter.Description: half of the maximum amplitude of the noise signal

ImplementationParameter.Name: sample_time_divisor
ImplementationParameter.Description: every sample_time_divisor sample cycles, a new random number is being generated.

ImplementationParameter.Name: sample_counter
ImplementationParameter.Description: counter for the sample_time_divisor

ImplementationParameter.Name: random_num
ImplementationParameter.Description: variable for the new random number

ImplementationParameter.Name: delta_phi
ImplementationParameter.Description: angle increment

ImplementationParameter.Name: phi
ImplementationParameter.Description: calculated angle

ImplementationParameter.Name: level_low
ImplementationParameter.Description: Output value when the quare wave is low

ImplementationParameter.Name: level_high
ImplementationParameter.Description: Output value when the quare wave is high

ImplementationParameter.Name: RateUp
ImplementationParameter.Description: Rising time parameter.

ImplementationParameter.Name: RateDown
ImplementationParameter.Description: Falling time parameter.
